author: cbs8
title: Decadence New Years Eve Tickets: Bassnectar, Deadmau5, Big Gigantic, Hardwell, Gramatik to Headline Decadence NYE Dec 30-31 in Denver, CO
text:
For the fifth year in a row, thousands will gather at the Colorado Convention Center to ring in the New Year at an epic party. Find tickets now at 303Tickets.com
(PRWEB) September 30, 2015
Global Dance Music, the brains behind the annual Global Dance Festival at Red Rocks unveils a massive NYE lineup for Decadence.
Decadence Tickets can be found at 303Tickets.com or by calling (303)Tickets (842-5387)
This year Decadence brings two nights of some of the top Electronic Dance Music (EDM) to the Colorado Convention Center in Denver Colorado, deadmau5 will join Big Gigantic, Hardwell, Hot Since 82, Excision, Jack LNDN, The Floozies, Bassnectar, Figure, Salva, Son of Kick, Black Tiger Sex Machine, Odesza, Gramatik, What So Not, UZ, Galantis, Matthew Koma, Dabin, Jai Wolf, and Jack Ãœ at Decadence 2015!, and many more.
The Colorado Convention Center will once again feature two massive main arenas stacked with world-class talent, massive production, elegant performers, diamond-clad decor, glimmering displays of technology, and luxurious art installations. From the highest skyscrapers to the darkest streets; intriguing indulgence awaits you around every corner in the City of Decadence.
Visit 303Tickets.com or call us at (303)TICKETS for these and other concerts available now for purchase at discount prices.
303tickets.com has a large selection of tickets for many events, including concert performances, theater shows and sports games. Tickets can be purchased securely due to the encryption methods that are used to protect sensitive data. All tickets come with a satisfaction guarantee and will arrive on time. Fans looking for affordable Decadence tickets for sale can find them easily at 303Tickets.
Fans who want to save money on tickets visit 303Tickets.com for the best ticket prices and selection. The website offers Ogden Theatre, Fillmore Auditorium, 1stBank Center, Pepsi Center tickets, and tickets for many of Colorado's most popular concert tours.
303Tickets.com is committed to excellent customer service and fast, secure shipping.
